Day 1 - March 9, 2022 (Wednesday)

- Flight from Monterey to Dallas (F4046679, $489 per person, total cost: $1,956)
- Departure time: 14:02; Arrival time: 19:18; Duration: 3 hours 16 minutes
- Flight distance: 1,430 miles (2,301 km)

Accommodation in Dallas for 3 nights (March 9 - March 12):
- SUNNY 2 BEDS - NEAR 3 METROS IN WILLIAMSBURG ($445 per night, total cost: $1,335)
  - 2 bedrooms, 2 guests, 3.0 rating, available from March 9th to March 12th
  - Description: Sunny 2 beds near 3 metros in Williamsburg, located in Brooklyn, New York City.

Dinner in Dallas (March 9):
- FRANCE LA TABLE ($50 per person, total cost: $200)
  - French cuisine, highly rated restaurant with a cozy atmosphere and delicious food.

Day 2 - March 10, 2022 (Thursday)

Activities in Dallas:
- Explore the city, visit famous landmarks such as The Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza and Reunion Tower

Lunch in Dallas:
- CHINATOWN PHO ($15 per person, total cost: $60)
  - Chinese and Vietnamese cuisine, affordable and popular among locals and tourists alike.

Dinner in Dallas (March 10):
- LUCKY'S NOODLES ($25 per person, total cost: $100)
  - Asian fusion with a focus on noodles, offering Chinese-inspired dishes and other delicious options.

Day 3 - March 11, 2022 (Friday)

- Flight from Dallas to Del Rio (F3592397, $136 per person, total cost: $544)
- Departure time: 21:19; Arrival time: 22:38; Duration: 1 hour 19 minutes
- Flight distance: 335 miles (539 km)

Accommodation in Del Rio for 2 nights (March 11 - March 13):
- Casa De La Paz ($60 per night, total cost: $120)
  - Comfortable and cozy Airbnb with 3 bedrooms, accommodating up to 4 guests.

Dinner in Del Rio (March 11):
- MEXICAN BAR & GRILL ($30 per person, total cost: $120)
  - Mexican cuisine, offering delicious food and a lively atmosphere for a fun night out.

Day 4 - March 12, 2022 (Saturday)

Activities in Del Rio:
- Enjoy Lake Amistad or visit the Seminole Canyon State Park & Historic Site

Lunch in Del Rio:
- LITTLE TEXAS CAFE ($15 per person, total cost: $60)
  - American cuisine with a focus on comfort food, perfect for a filling lunch.

Dinner in Del Rio (March 12):
- CHINESE BISTRO ($20 per person, total cost: $80)
  - Chinese and Asian fusion dishes, offering flavorful options for dinner.

Day 5 - March 13, 2022 (Sunday)

- Drive from Del Rio to San Antonio (approximately 3 hours and 30 minutes, total cost: $40 in gas)

Accommodation in San Antonio for 2 nights (March 13 - March 15):
- French Quarter Lofts ($150 per night, total cost: $300)
  - Luxurious and spacious Airbnb with 2 bedrooms, accommodating up to 4 guests.

Lunch in San Antonio (March 13):
- BIENVENIDOS CAFÉ ($20 per person, total cost: $80)
  - Mexican cuisine, serving authentic dishes that reflect the rich culture of San Antonio.

Dinner in San Antonio (March 13):
- BOTTEGA ITALIA ($30 per person, total cost: $120)
  - Italian and Mediterranean cuisine, offering delicious pasta dishes, seafood, and more.

Day 6 - March 14, 2022 (Monday)

Activities in San Antonio:
- Visit The Alamo and enjoy a stroll along the River Walk

Lunch in San Antonio (March 14):
- CHINA PEARL ($25 per person, total cost: $100)
  - Chinese cuisine with a focus on dim sum and noodle dishes, offering delicious options for lunch.

Dinner in San Antonio (March 14):
- LITTLE FRANCE ($40 per person, total cost: $160)
  - French bistro with a cozy atmosphere and an extensive menu featuring classic and contemporary dishes.

Day 7 - March 15, 2022 (Tuesday)

- Drive from San Antonio to Monterey (approximately 24 hours, total cost: $135 in gas)

Total cost for the trip (excluding shopping and activities): $6,289 per person, which is well within your budget of $15,600. The remaining balance can be used for additional meals, shopping, or any unplanned expenses during the trip.

Safe travels!
